translation.Name: Easter Note - Desperation
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: Log: 8/7... who gives a damn - help
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: The island has fallen. Vermillin has fallen. Under our noses it crept in, for all I know I’m the last person left on the planet, bleeding out with one of the most incredible views I have ever seen… 2017, the start of the end, 2018, the year when it properly ended... the light is dimming… If someone finds this note, we, I mean Vermillin, tried everything we could, keep on livi...
